name: Curivari - Achilles La Lliado - No. 2
additionalNotes: The Curivari Achilles La Lliada cigar line was released at the 2018 IPCPR trade show, a Nicaraguan puro that packs on the flavor. The Curivari Achilles La Lliada delivers a medium to medium-full bodied smoke that’s both balanced and smooth. This box-pressed cigar is packed with rich notes of wood, with hints of pepper, rounded out by a hint of sweetness on the finish.
